channel.title: Compile messup (not javac error)

item.title: Compile messup (not javac error)
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

alrite heres my pickup command :

} else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“x91”)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount)
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}

well whenver i try to compile i get 2 errors saying:

client.java:9796 illegal start of type
} else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playername.equalsIgnoreCase(“x91”)) {
^
client.java:14041 expected
};
^

2 Errors press any key to continue

Read full topic
